item.description:
Interested in networking with professionals from the Health & Wellness field?
Would you benefit from meeting local area business owners, who are experts in their fields?
Are you looking to learn the 'inside scoop' on Health & Wellness, including new techniques, strategies, and ideas?
Looking for a weekend networking opportunity in a laid-back atmosphere that is both productive, educational, and FUN?

On Saturday, July 24th from 10:00am until 2:00pm - Successful Anonymous will be at Energize Fitness Studio in West Newton, 1387 Washington Street, hosting our Debut Health & Wellness Expo. Rachel Kobey, our gracious host, will also have demonstrations on the new and unique fitness techniques.

The studio will have booths set up, much like a Trade Show, where as an attendee, you will be able to chat with Acupuncturists, Massage Therapists, Chiropractors, Nutritionists, and MANY MORE - all under one roof!

The event will be open to the public, but as a SUCCESS ADDICT you will get VIP treatment! Personal introductions to all of the presenters, facilitated networking based on YOUR desired focus, and much more!

This is a GREAT opportunity to network, jumpstart your career, meet new people, learn new health and wellness techniques, and kickoff the weekend in a great, productive way! SPREAD THE WORD!
item.name: Successful Anonymous: Health & Wellness Expo - Sat. July 24th
